page.title: 09SHOPPING ON RHUM
page.content:
There is one shop on Rhum.This shop is mainly a Post Office, but sells some supplies like fruit, vegetables, sweets and alcoholic drinks.
Several people on the island keep hens to provide a supply of fresh eggs which other locals can purchase.
Other foods and supplies have to be ordered from the mainland or Eigg (a neighbouring island). The food is sent over on the Caledonian MacBrayne ferry.
If items such as clothes, shoes or electrical appliances are required, various catalogues are used. The goods ordered from these sources usually come in the mail.
